conbody.p: QuoteCheck is a service offered through Shepard's® BriefCheck that verifies the quotations in your brief are valid and correctly cited. You can select a report for each quote, and the service will let you know if:

li: Quote Check could not find a match for your quote.
Your quote is substantially the same as retrieved quote.
Your quote was found on a different page.
Your quote is different from the retrieved quote.
Your quote is different from the retrieved quote. A better match was found on a different page.
The retrieved quote was found on a different page.
